title: description
Mario's Apple Brandy Sour: A girl variant of the Apple Brandy Sour. As bad as Mario's everything.

title: notes
Mario's Apple Brandy Sour: Lemon, Juice and a dash of things.

title: pairing
Mario's Apple Brandy Sour: Mario has it with a ninetynine Squab Chicken and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Mario's Apple Brandy Sour: Serve in a sour glass (4.0 oz). Drink to the good sounds of Let Me Love You.
